item.title: Is fine Art a fine Investment? Let's find out using web scraping!
item.description: Idea The inspiration to write this article was a documentary about the life of a famous “con” artist Mr. Beltracchi link which got me curious about art trading & auctions. I often hear the media saying: “Invest in fine Art, it is a great investment!
